example.text: Innocent families and communities in Israel are under attack at the hands of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad. I fully condemn these attacks by a radical terrorist group. Israel has the right to defend itself, and I’m grateful for the lives that the Iron Dome has saved. ? ?? ?
I'm proud to introduce the bipartisan Stop Foreign Funds in Elections Act with [[user]] to ensure that American voices are not drowned out by foreign entities at the ballot box. [[url]]

I am proud to have advocated for this bill which links the National September 11th Memorial and Museum in New York City, the Pentagon Memorial in Arlington, Virginia, and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Somerset County, Pennsylvania. Thank you to the entire Board of Directors for the 9/11 National Memorial Trail Alliance and a special thank you to Waste Management for your generous grant that will be used to forever commemorate our heroes and memorialize the innocent lives our nation lost on 9/11.

PFAS Study Currently the PFAS Multi-site Health Study facility in Warminster is conducting an ongoing PFAS study taking place near the Naval Air Warfare Center in Warminster and Willow Grove Naval Air Base in Horsham. The purpose of this ongoing study is to analyze the human health effects for adults and children in communities exposed to PFAS through drinking water.
I was honored to join them yesterday and receive their Congressional Award. We will always stand with them in their fight for a free, open, and democratic Vietnam. [[url]]
